thread.title: Assad turns his sights on Syrian rebel outposts

title: Assad turns his sights on Syrian rebel outposts
text:
Assad turns his sights on Syrian rebel outposts Tuesday, May 01, 2018 - 01:41
The Syrian army unleashed a massive bombardment on the largest encircled rebel stronghold in Syria on Monday (April 30), as the forces of President Bashar al-Assad seek to crush remaining rebel outposts. David Doyle reports.
The Syrian army unleashed a massive bombardment on the largest encircled rebel stronghold in Syria on Monday (April 30), as the forces of President Bashar al-Assad seek to crush remaining rebel outposts.
